pages.text: $(li)Quartz Block is a new decorative block that it can be used to save $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/nether_quartz)Nether Quartz$(/l) in a more efficient way.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/mason)Masons$(/l) will exchange Quartz Blocks by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).

$(li)You can use Quartz blocks to craft Quartz Pillars, Quartz Walls, Quartz Bricks, Quartz Slabs, or Quartz Stairs in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can make a Smooth Quartz Block Smelting a Block of Quartz in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/charm/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can place it in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/stonecutter)Stonecutter$(/l) to make new decorative blocks.
